response.explain: The previous action code successfully opened the fridge. The next step is to take the bacon out of the fridge. However, the bacon is inside the tray, so we need to take the tray out first.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge.
(2) Open the fridge.
(3) Take the tray out of the fridge.
(4) Take the bacon out of the tray.
(5) Cook the bacon on the stove.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    tray = registry(env,"tray_156")
    EasyGrasp(robot, tray)
    donothing(env)
